items.content_html: PrintCardify is a lightweight web application designed for printing cards with content on both sides. This application ensures that the content on both sides of the card is perfectly aligned when printed from the same location on a page.

items.content_html: Ethereum Checksum Address Generator: A Node.js script that calculates the checksum of an Ethereum address, ensuring its accuracy and security. Easily verify and generate Ethereum checksum addresses for use in blockchain transactions. Simplify your Ethereum address management with this lightweight and efficient tool

Easily verify and generate Ethereum checksum addresses for use in blockchain transactions. Simplify your Ethereum address management with this lightweight and efficient tool
